note: Folklore ,Linguistic Cultural Historian and Theory.Researcher: Unearthing stories hidden in folklore & traditions. Ancient whispers, modern echoes. Folklorist: Weaving tapestries of belief & practice. From rituals to rhymes, I capture the soul of communities. Cultural Historian: Dusting off history's forgotten corners. Uncovering the roots of who we are. Theory Weaver: Spinning webs of meaning, connecting past, present, and future. Folklore's secrets are my playground.
